perception
==========

Description
-----------
The module is used to set/get the setting of the perception. 
The module uses ``URL`` located at :doc:`gemini_login` as the base url.

.. note::

    for more information on the module and for the information about the fields that can be altered in the
    JSON files being sent as request body please refere to the `user manual <https://static.ouster.dev/ouster-detect/lidar_hub/lidar_hub.html#perception-software-stack>`_.

.. automodule:: gemini_perception_API
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
